dt-example.title: Viewing Totals, Subtotals and Cascading Panes
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example demonstrates the `cascadePanes` feature working alongside the `viewTotal` feature. This allows the panes to be filtered based on the values selected in the other panes. `cascadePanes` is false as default, as is `viewTotal`.
